'''Iron nautilus armor''' is a type of [[nautilus armor]] that can be equipped by a [[nautilus]] that reduces the damage received to the nautilus. It is the fourth-strongest [[tier]] of nautilus armor, having higher armor points than [[copper nautilus armor]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|iron-nautilus-armor}}

== Usage ==
=== Equipping ===
Iron nautilus armor can be equipped on a [[tame]]d nautilus by holding the nautilus armor and using the {{Control|use|text=use button}} on a nautilus. It is also able to be equipped manually by putting it into the nautilus armor slot through mounting the nautilus and using its {{control|inventory}} control, or by {{control|sneaking}} and then {{control|using}} or pressing the "open inventory" button{{only|bedrock}}.

Baby nautiluses are unable to equip nautilus armor as they are not rideable.

=== Protection ===
When equipped, iron nautilus armor gives {{Armor|5}} [[armor points]].
